org.kiji.schema
Class KijiTableReaderPool

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.pool.BaseObjectPool<T>
      org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool<KijiTableReaderPool.PooledKijiTableReader>
          org.kiji.schema.KijiTableReaderPool
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, org.apache.commons.pool.ObjectPool<KijiTableReaderPool.PooledKijiTableReader>
@ApiAudience.Public
@ApiStability.Evolving
public final class KijiTableReaderPool
extends org.apache.commons.pool.impl.GenericObjectPool<KijiTableReaderPool.PooledKijiTableReader>
implements Closeable

Maintains a pool of opened KijiTableReaders for reuse.

KijiTableReaders retrieved from the pool should be closed as normal when no longer needed. Closing a KijiTableReader from this pool will return it to the pool and make it available to other users.

KijiTableReaderPool instances retain the KijiTable associated with the KijiReaderFactory which provides readers for the pool. Closing the pool will release the table.

          KijiTableReader implementation which can be served from a pool.

          Factory for pooled KijiTableReaders.

                                         Map<KijiColumnName,CellSpec> overrides,

Create a new KijiTableReaderPool which uses the given reader factory to create reader objects.

Parameters:
readerFactory - KijiReaderFactory from which to get new reader instances.
overrides - Optional CellSpec overrides with which to build the readers.
config - Configuration which describes the behavior of the pool.
Returns:
a new KijiTableReaderPool.
